name: Keyboard Crusade (William Landis)
description:
Play as a plucky programmer stuck in a dead-end internship, finally given a chance to prove their coworkers wrong for doubting them.

Matthew Stevens - Programming

William Landis - Music and Sound Design

Patch - Art

Scott Ethington - Original Idea

Dingaloo - Bug Fixes

Note: boss fight may appear sooner than expected or not at all.
